means: 淹没( overwhelm的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Sightseers may be a little overwhelmed by the crowds and noise.
sentence.Network_cn: 拥挤的人群和喧闹的噪音可能会让游客有些茫然不知所措。

sentence.Network_en: Her burst of exuberance and her brightness overwhelmed me.
sentence.Network_cn: 她勃发的热情和阳光的性格征服了我。

sentence.Network_en: I was overwhelmed with longing for those innocent days of early childhood.
sentence.Network_cn: 我内心充满着对纯真的童年时光的怀念。

PerfectNetExp.abs: He was overwhelmed with grief ., 他不胜悲伤.
The small craft was overwhelmed by the enormous waves ., 小船被巨大的海浪打翻了.
铁血雄师 ... feel ashamed 深感内疚 overwhelmed 被压倒 stumble 蹒跚而行.
The enemy were overwhelmed by superior forces ., 敌人被优越之兵击溃.

list.abs: ...压倒性例外（overwhelming exception）是一种非形式谬误，系提出一个看似普遍性通则的结论，却附加了涵括大多数例外的声明，以期误导对方相信该通则具有普遍性。== 示例 ==* 你提出的要求我必定答应，除非有不答应的必要。* 我国总是在帮助其他国家，当然，有悖我国利益的情况除外。.
superi... ... fire superiority 火力优势 overwhelming superiority 绝对优势，绝对优势 comparison of superiority 劣［优］等比较.
英语新闻常用词汇大全 - 豆丁网 ... overture 序曲 overwhelming majority 压倒性多数 palm phone 大哥大.
口译英语分类词汇大全—会议讲话 ... 宣告结束 pack it in 压倒多数 overwhelming majority 修改 modify.
《星际争霸》秘籍 ... Parasite = 寄生侦察虫 power overwhelming = 无敌 the gathering = psionic stuff 法力能量无限.

entry.tran: （情感、事件等）使不知所措，使难以承受
entry.def: If you are overwhelmed by a feeling or event, it affects you very strongly, and you do not know how to deal with it.

example.ex: He was overwhelmed by a longing for times past...
The need to talk to someone, anyone, overwhelmed her.
example.tran: 她迫不及待地要找个人说说话，随便是谁都行。

entry.def: If a group of people overwhelm a place or another group, they gain complete control or victory over them.

example.ex: It was clear that one massive Allied offensive would overwhelm the weakened enemy.
example.tran: 毫无疑问，盟军一次大规模的进攻就会击溃已是强弩之末的敌军。

means.word_mean: 1. rendered powerless especially by an excessive amount or profusion of something;

auth_sentence.content: I was really overwhelmed and felt really teary already.
auth_sentence.res_content: I was really overwhelmed and felt really teary already.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I was really overwhelmed and felt really teary already.

auth_sentence.content: She was suddenly overwhelmed by an immense breaking sea.
auth_sentence.res_content: She was suddenly overwhelmed by an immense breaking sea.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She was suddenly overwhelmed by an immense breaking sea.

auth_sentence.content: Commins refuses to blame the "overwhelmed" police.
auth_sentence.res_content: Commins refuses to blame the "overwhelmed" police.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Commins refuses to blame the "overwhelmed" police.

Sentence.sentence: For some, the hardships of life without steady work eventually overwhelmed their attempts to keep their families together.
To avoid being overwhelmed by stress.
Its schools will be overwhelmed by the growing number of illegal immigrants.
Students are graduating with a variety of skills and interests, but often find themselves overwhelmed when it comes to choosing an ultimate career goal.
They are overwhelmed by their own prejudices.
